emptyState.title: No clips yet
emptyState.description: Clips will appear here once they are generated from your recordings

publishPage.title: Publish to TikTok
publishPage.description: Review your video and choose how you want to share it on TikTok
publishPage.descriptionPlaceholder: Write a title for your video...
publishPage.commercialContentDescription: Turn on to disclose that this video promotes goods or services in exchange for something of value. Your video could promote yourself, a third party, or both.
publishPage.brandContentDescription: You are promoting yourself or your own business. This content will be classified as Brand Organic.
publishPage.brandOrganicDescription: You are promoting another brand or a third party. This content will be classified as Branded Content.
publishPage.promotionalContentLabel: Your video will be labeled as 'Promotional content'.
publishPage.paidPartnershipLabel: Your video will be labeled as 'Paid partnership'.
publishPage.cannotChangeWarning: This cannot be changed once your video is posted.
publishPage.musicConfirmation: By posting, you agree to TikTok's Music Usage Confirmation
publishPage.musicConfirmationPrefix: By posting, you agree to TikTok's
publishPage.brandedContentConfirmationPrefix: By posting, you agree to TikTok's
publishPage.commercialContentToggle: This content promotes yourself, a brand, product or service
publishPage.commercialContentRequired: You need to indicate if your content promotes yourself, a third party, or both
publishPage.brandedContentPrivacyWarning: Branded content cannot be set to private visibility
publishPage.successMessage: Your video is being published to TikTok. It may take a few minutes to process and appear on your profile.

validation.privacyRequired: Please select who can view this video
validation.musicConfirmationRequired: You must agree to the Music Usage Confirmation

publishPage.cannotPostNow: You've reached your daily posting limit on TikTok. Please try again later.
publishPage.videoTooLong: This video is {duration} seconds long, but TikTok only allows videos up to {maxDuration} seconds for your account.
publishPage.selfOnlyDisabledBranded: Branded content visibility cannot be set to private
